## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G45260](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G45260)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CHIQ1, COST1</u>
- **Gene Name:** CHIQUITA1, constitutively stressed 1
- **Description:**   myosin-4 protein (DUF641);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2050891
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_064001C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced leaf size.Small stature, smaller organs.
   - [SALK_064001C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Smaller leaves and reduced plant height due to smaller cell size. Increased drought tolerance.
